name: Breathing Fear
description: This story is about a man brought by his fate to an abandoned house in the woods. This place mysteriously makes him be afraid of his own shadow, and thatâ€™s driving him crazy. Will he be able to stay sane and solve all the mysteries of the cursed house?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio

reviews.review_text: Not bad for a $3 pixeled game this is very good.
